edu.calpoly.spritely

Interface Display


  • public interface Display
    Something that displays either sprites, or graphics-based animation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void closeFrame()
      Close the frame, if one exists, and free any needed resources.
      boolean pollForInput(boolean mouseEvents)
      Do any polling for input that might be needed.
      void start()
      Start the display, e.g.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        void start()
        Start the display, e.g. by opening a graphical window.

      • closeFrame

        void closeFrame()
        Close the frame, if one exists, and free any needed resources.

      • pollForInput

        boolean pollForInput(boolean mouseEvents)
        Do any polling for input that might be needed. Return true if input was received.
        Parameters:
        mouseEvents - true iff mouse events are wanted, too
        Returns:
        true if input was processed
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if start() has been called on the corresponding SpriteWindow.
